title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single command-line tool and a built-in model registry.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models programmatically.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as a local LLM for chains, agents and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that clones ChatGPT look-and-feel but talks to your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings and tool-calling support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: chat, generate, embed and pull models with idiomatic Ruby.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with readline, history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-selector and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub with one-liner run examples.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator for building local NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, chat and embeddings support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows (chat, generate, embed).

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration that injects an Ollama4j client bean for Java microservices.

title: ollama-litellm
summary: LiteLLM provider module letting you call Ollama through a unified OpenAI-like interface.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama with tokio-based async client and streaming support.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All UI branch that adds Ollama backend support so you can switch between local backends.

title: ollama-macos-menu-bar
summary: Native macOS menu-bar app to start/stop Ollama services and chat in a pop-over window.
